title: The nervous generation: American thought, 1917-1930
features: A major reinterpretation of American thought from 1917 to 1930, with a lively foray into the popular culture of the supposedly roaring twenties.
description: Roderick Nash is Professor of History and Environmental Studies at the University of California, Santa Barbara. His other books include
, a pioneering book which has become a small classic in American history.
